policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: grafana
  name: grafana
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_USER
          value: admin
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD
          value: password
        image: grafana/grafana:8.3.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 150m
            memory: 340Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources/prometheus.yml
          name: grafana-configmap-datasources
          readOnly: true
          subPath: prometheus.yml
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/dashboards/dashboard.yml
          name: grafana-configmap-dashboards-dashboard
          readOnly: true
          subPath: dashboard.yml
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/dashboards/besu.json
          name: grafana-configmap-dashboards-besu
          readOnly: true
          subPath: besu.json
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: besu-grafana-configmap-datasources
        name: grafana-configmap-datasources
      - configMap:
          name: besu-grafana-configmap-dashboards-dashboard
        name: grafana-configmap-dashboards-dashboard
      - configMap:
          name: besu-grafana-configmap-dashboards-besu
        name: grafana-configmap-dashboards-besu

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: grafana
      name: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GF_SERVER_HTTP_PORT
          value: "3000"
        - name: GF_AUTH_BASIC_ENABLED
          value: "false"
        - name: GF_AUTH_ANONYMOUS_ENABLED
          value: "true"
        - name: GF_AUTH_ANONYMOUS_ORG_ROLE
          value: Admin
        - name: GF_SERVER_ROOT_URL
          value: /
        - name: GT_PATHS_DATA
          value: /var/lib/grafana
        image: grafana/grafana:latest
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: grafana
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-storage
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/hostname: node3
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 472
      volumes:
      - name: grafana-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: grafana-pvc

##### FILE: grafana-deployment68_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose --file ../local-setup/local-dockercompose.yaml convert --profile
      all
    kompose.version: 1.32.0 (HEAD)
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: grafana
  name: grafana
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: grafana
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose --file ../local-setup/local-dockercompose.yaml convert
          --profile all
        kompose.version: 1.32.0 (HEAD)
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/local-setup-my-network: "true"
        io.kompose.service: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GF_AUTH_ANONYMOUS_ENABLED
          value: "true"
        - name: GF_AUTH_ANONYMOUS_ORG_ROLE
          value: Admin
        - name: GF_AUTH_DISABLE_LOGIN_FORM
          value: "true"
        - name: GF_FEATURE_TOGGLES_ENABLE
          value: traceqlEditor
        image: grafana/grafana:10.1.1
        name: otel-grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          hostPort: 3000
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources/
          name: grafana-claim0
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: sources
            path: datasources.yaml
          name: grafana-configmap
        name: grafana-claim0

---

##### FILE: grafana-deployment76.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: grafana
  name: grafana
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: grafana/grafana:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3000
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: http-grafana
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /robots.txt
            port: 3000
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 30
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 750Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-pv
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 472
        supplementalGroups:
        - 0
      volumes:
      - name: grafana-pv
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: grafana-pvc

---

##### FILE: grafana-deployment78_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to blog-system/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: grafana
  name: grafana
  namespace: blog-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 0
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: grafana
      namespace: blog-system
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD
          value: admin
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_USER
          value: admin
        image: grafana/grafana:10.4.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: grafana
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources
          name: config-datasources
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/dashboards
          name: config-dashboards
        - mountPath: /etc/dashboards
          name: dashboards
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirstWithHostNet
      hostNetwork: true
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 60
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: grafana-dashboards
        name: grafana-dashboards
      - configMap:
          name: grafana-conf-dashboards
        name: grafana-conf-dashboards

---

##### FILE: grafana-deployment8_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/grafana-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: prometheus-thanos-grafana
  name: grafana-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: grafana
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: prometheus-thanos-grafana
        name: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: grafana/grafana:9.1.0
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3000
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: http-grafana
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /robots.txt
            port: 3000
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 30
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsGroup: 0
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources
          name: datasource
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-storage
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: grafana-datasource
        name: datasource
      - name: grafana-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: grafana-pvc

---

##### FILE: grafana-deployment85.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_USER
          value: admin
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD
          value: admin
        image: grafana/grafana:latest
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-data
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning
          name: provisioning
      volumes:
      - name: grafana-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: grafana-pvc
      - hostPath:
          path: /path/to/provisioning
        name: provisioning

---

    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/group.order: "2"
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/healthcheck-interval-seconds: "15"
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/healthcheck-port: traffic-port
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/healthcheck-protocol: HTTP
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/healthcheck-timeout-seconds: "5"

  namespace: monitoring

##### FILE: grafana-ldap.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/grafana-ini:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  grafana.ini: "[auth.ldap]\nenabled = true\nconfig_file = /etc/grafana/ldap.toml\nallow_sign_up
    = true  \n[analytics]\ncheck_for_updates = true\n[grafana_net]\nurl = https://grafana.net\n[log]\nmode
    = console\n[paths]\ndata = /var/lib/grafana/data\nlogs = /var/log/grafana\nplugins
    = /var/lib/grafana/plugins\n[users]\ndefault_theme = light    \n"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    app: grafana
  name: grafana-ini
  namespace: default

##### FILE: grafana-ldap_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: grafana
      name: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: admin-user
              name: grafana-secrect
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: admin-password
              name: grafana-secrect
        image: docker.io/grafana/grafana:8.5.13
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: grafana
        resources: null
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources
          name: datasources
          readOnly: false
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/grafana.ini
          name: config
          subPath: grafana.ini
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana/dashboards
          name: dashboards
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/dashboards/
          name: dashboardproviders
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-storage
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/ldap.toml
          name: grafana-ldap
          subPath: ldap.toml
      serviceAccountName: grafana
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: grafana-datasources
        name: datasources
      - configMap:
          name: grafana-ini
        name: config
      - configMap:
          name: grafana-dashboardproviders
        name: dashboardproviders
      - configMap:
          name: grafana-dashboards
        name: dashboards
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: grafana-storage
      - name: grafana-ldap
        secret:
          secretName: grafana-ldap-toml

---


Mutation:

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/grafana failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/grafana failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/grafana failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

##### FILE: grafana-networkPolicy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/NetworkPolicy/grafana:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: grafana
    app.kubernetes.io/name: grafana
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-prometheus
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 9.5.3
  name: grafana
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  egress:
  - {}
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus
    ports:
    - port: 3000
      protocol: TCP
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: grafana
      app.kubernetes.io/name: grafana
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-prometheus
  policyTypes:
  - Egress
  - Ingress

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/NetworkPolicy/grafana:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: grafana
    app.kubernetes.io/name: grafana
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-prometheus
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 11.2.1
  name: grafana
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  egress:
  - {}
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus
    ports:
    - port: 3000
      protocol: TCP
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          kubernetes.io/metadata.name: ingress-nginx
    ports:
    - port: 3000
      protocol: TCP
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: grafana
      app.kubernetes.io/name: grafana
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-prometheus
  policyTypes:
  - Egress
  - Ingress

---

##### FILE: grafana-pv1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/PersistentVolume/grafana-pv:
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: grafana-pv
  namespace: default
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  capacity:
    storage: 5Gi
  local:
    path: /data-pv/grafana
  nodeAffinity:
    required:
      nodeSelectorTerms:
      - matchExpressions:
        - key: kubernetes.io/hostname
          operator: In
          values:
          - worker1
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Delete
  storageClassName: local-storage
  volumeMode: Filesystem

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
metadata:
  name: grafana-pvc
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 1Gi
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      type: local
  storageClassName: manual

##### FILE: grafana-renderer.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/grafana-renderer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: grafana-renderer
  name: grafana-renderer
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana-renderer
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: grafana-renderer
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: grafana/grafana-image-renderer:latest
        name: grafana-renderer
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 256Mi

---

            memory: 256Mi

        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: developer

##### FILE: grafana-statefulset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  serviceName: grafana-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: grafana-config
        image: grafana/grafana:latest
        name: grafana
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-storage
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: grafana-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 2Gi

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/StatefulSet/grafana

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/StatefulSet/grafana
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/StatefulSet/grafana failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/StatefulSet/grafana failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/StatefulSet/grafana failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/StatefulSet/grafana failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/StatefulSet/grafana failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/StatefulSet/grafana failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/StatefulSet/grafana failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/StatefulSet/grafana failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

##### FILE: grafana-tcp-service.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Service/grafana:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f ./docker/docker-compose.yml -o ./kubernetes/
    kompose.security-context.fsgroup: "1000"
    kompose.service.type: loadbalancer
    kompose.version: 1.34.0 (cbf2835db)
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: grafana-tcp
  name: grafana
  namespace: default
spec:
  ports:
  - name: "3000"
    port: 3000
    targetPort: 3000
  selector:
    io.kompose.service: grafana
  type: LoadBalancer

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: grafanauihttps.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ydb/Ingress/grafana-server-https:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/force-ssl-redirect: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-passthrough: "true"
  name: grafana-server-https
  namespace: ydb
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: grafana.minikube.local
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: kube-prometheus-stack-grafana
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 1, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: grafana-volume.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/PersistentVolume/grafana:
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: default
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteMany
  capacity:
    storage: 10Gi
  nfs:
    path: /nfs_shared/grafana
    server: 192.168.1.10
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain

---

##### FILE: graphite.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/prometheus-graphite-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: prometheus-graphite-exporter
  name: prometheus-graphite-exporter
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: prometheus-graphite-exporter
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9108"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: prometheus-graphite-exporter
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --graphite.listen-address=0.0.0.0:2003
        - --graphite.mapping-config=/etc/prometheus/graphite_mapping.conf
        image: prom/graphite-exporter:v0.16.0
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9108
        name: prometheus-graphite-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9108
          name: metrics
        - containerPort: 2003
          name: graphite
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9108
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 64m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 64m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 65534
          runAsUser: 65534
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/prometheus
          name: config-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: prometheus-graphite-exporter-config
        name: config-volume

---

##### FILE: graphql_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ecommerce/Deployment/graphql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.1.6
  name: graphql
  namespace: ecommerce
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: graphql
      role: api
      workload: ecommerce
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: graphql
        role: api
        version: 0.1.6
        workload: ecommerce
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - orders
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: lukondefmwila/ecommerce-graphql:0.1.6
        name: graphql-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3002
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 64Mi
      serviceAccountName: graphql-service-account

---

          value: "0"

##### FILE: graylog-cluster.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/graylog:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: graylog
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: graylog
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: graylog
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchLabels:
                  app: graylog
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GRAYLOG_PASSWORD_SECRET
          value: somepasswordpepper
        - name: GRAYLOG_ROOT_PASSWORD_SHA2
          value: 415e8a6ba1c3eb93e81df34731acc3d60efee685c8e6f7412592a45ba3a0e3b0
        - name: GRAYLOG_HTTP_EXTERNAL_URI
          value: http://127.0.0.1:9000/
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: elastic
              name: es-graylog-es-elastic-user
        - name: GRAYLOG_ELASTICSEARCH_HOSTS
          value: http://elastic:$(ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD)@es-graylog-es-http:9200
        - name: GRAYLOG_MONGODB_URI
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: connectionString.standardSrv
              name: mongodb-graylog-graylog-graylog
        - name: GRAYLOG_PROMETHEUS_EXPORTER_ENABLED
          value: "true"
        image: graylog/graylog:6.0.0
        name: graylog
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: web
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 1514
          name: syslog-tcp
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 1514
          name: syslog-udp
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 12201
          name: gelf-tcp
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 12201
          name: gelf-udp
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 9833
          name: prometheus
          protocol: TCP

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:6.0.4
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-data
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: mongodb-data

kind: Deployment
metadata:

  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: opensearch
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: opensearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: OPENSEARCH_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
        - name: bootstrap.memory_lock
          value: "true"
        - name: discovery.type
          value: single-node
        - name: action.auto_create_index
          value: "false"
        - name: plugins.security.ssl.http.enabled
          value: "false"
        - name: plugins.security.disabled
          value: "true"
        image: opensearchproject/opensearch:2.6.0
        name: opensearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
        - containerPort: 9300
        - containerPort: 9600
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/opensearch/data
          name: opensearch-data
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: opensearch-data

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/green-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: green-app
  name: green-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: green-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: green-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: adamtravis/rollouts:green
        name: my-green-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi

##### FILE: green4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/green:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: green
  name: green
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: green
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: green
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: test-volume
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /data/green-nginx/
        name: test-volume
status: {}

---

##### FILE: green-app.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/green-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  index.html: |
    <!doctype html>
    <html lang="">
    <head>
        <meta charset="utf-8"/>
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width"/>
        <title>Green application</title>
        <style>
            body {
                width: 35em;
                margin: 0 auto;
                font-family: Tahoma, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif;
                background-color: green;
                color: white;
            }
        </style>
    </head>
    <body>
    <h1 style="text-align: center">Welcome to the Green Application!</h1>
    </body>
    </html>
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: green-config
  namespace: default

---

##### FILE: green-app_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/green-dep:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    configmap.reloader.stakater.com/reload: green-config
  labels:
    app: green-dep
  name: green-dep
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: green-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        run: green-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: green-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: green-config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: green-config
        name: green-config

---

        ports:

        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: green-config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: green-config
        name: green-config

##### FILE: green-dep.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/green-dep:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: green-dep
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      target: green-dep
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: status
        color: green
        target: green-dep
      name: green-dep
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: IMAGE_COLOR
          value: green
        - name: NODE_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_SERVICE_ACCOUNT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName
        image: scubakiz/servicedemo:1.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: servicedemo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/podinfo
          name: podinfo
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      volumes:
      - downwardAPI:
          items:
          - fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels
            path: labels
          - fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.annotations
            path: annotations
        name: podinfo

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/green-dep:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: green-dep
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      target: green-dep
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: status
        color: green
        target: green-dep
      name: green-dep
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: IMAGE_COLOR
          value: green
        - name: NODE_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_SERVICE_ACCOUNT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName
        image: scubakiz/servicedemo:1.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: servicedemo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/podinfo
          name: podinfo
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      volumes:
      - downwardAPI:
          items:
          - fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels
            path: labels
          - fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.annotations
            path: annotations
        name: podinfo

##### FILE: green-deployment3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend-green:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: green
  name: frontend-green
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: green
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: green
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_HOST
              name: frontend-configmaps
        - name: DB_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_PORT
              name: frontend-configmaps
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_USER
              name: frontend-configmaps
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_NAME
              name: frontend-configmaps
        - name: DB_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_PASS
              name: frontend-secrets
        image: docker-registry:5000/4linux-php:v2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: 4linux-php
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: regcred

---

##### FILE: green-useast2-ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/fpjfrontend-ingress3:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/scheme: internet-facing
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/tags: Environment=staging
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/target-type: instance
  name: fpjfrontend-ingress3
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: alb
  rules:
  - http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: fpjfrontend-service-nodeport
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

---

1 - disallow-empty-ingress-host The Ingress host name must be defined, not empty.

apiVersion: apps/v1

  namespace: default

  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: greeting
  template:

        app: greeting

##### FILE: grpc-echo_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to echo-grpc/Deployment/echo-v1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: echo-v1
  namespace: echo-grpc
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: echo
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        inject.istio.io/templates: grpc-agent
        proxy.istio.io/config: '{"holdApplicationUntilProxyStarts": true}'
      labels:
        app: echo
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --metrics=15014
        - --port
        - "18080"
        - --tcp
        - "19090"
        - --xds-grpc-server=17070
        - --grpc
        - "17070"
        - --grpc
        - "17171"
        - --port
        - "3333"
        - --port
        - "8080"
        - --version
        - v1
        - --crt=/cert.crt
        - --key=/cert.key
        env:
        - name: INSTANCE_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: gcr.io/istio-testing/app:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: tcp-health-port
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 17070
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 17171
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 3333
          name: tcp-health-port
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 2
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: tcp-health-port
          timeoutSeconds: 1

---


Mutation:

1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource echo-grpc/Deployment/echo-v1 failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource echo-grpc/Deployment/echo-v1 failed:

##### FILE: grpc-echo_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to echo-grpc/Deployment/echo-v2:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: echo-v2
  namespace: echo-grpc
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: echo
      version: v2
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        inject.istio.io/templates: grpc-agent
        proxy.istio.io/config: '{"holdApplicationUntilProxyStarts": true}'
      labels:
        app: echo
        version: v2
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --metrics=15014
        - --xds-grpc-server=17070
        - --port
        - "18080"
        - --tcp
        - "19090"
        - --grpc
        - "17070"
        - --grpc
        - "17171"
        - --port
        - "3333"
        - --port
        - "8080"
        - --version
        - v2
        - --crt=/cert.crt
        - --key=/cert.key
        env:
        - name: INSTANCE_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: gcr.io/istio-testing/app:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: tcp-health-port
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 17070
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 17171
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 3333
          name: tcp-health-port
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 2
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: tcp-health-port
          timeoutSeconds: 1

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: grpc-echo1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to echo-grpc/Service/echo:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  labels:
    app: echo
  name: echo
  namespace: echo-grpc
spec:
  ports:
  - name: http
    port: 80
    targetPort: 18080
  - name: grpc
    port: 7070
    targetPort: 17070
  - name: tcp
    port: 9090
    targetPort: 19090
  selector:
    app: echo
  type: ClusterIP

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: grpc-echo1_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to echo-grpc/Deployment/echo-v1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: echo-v1
  namespace: echo-grpc
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: echo
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        inject.istio.io/templates: grpc-agent
        proxy.istio.io/config: '{"holdApplicationUntilProxyStarts": true}'
      labels:
        app: echo
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --metrics=15014
        - --port
        - "18080"
        - --tcp
        - "19090"
        - --xds-grpc-server=17070
        - --grpc
        - "17070"
        - --grpc
        - "17171"
        - --port
        - "3333"
        - --port
        - "8080"
        - --version
        - v1
        - --crt=/cert.crt
        - --key=/cert.key
        env:
        - name: INSTANCE_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: gcr.io/istio-testing/app:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: tcp-health-port
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 17070
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 17171
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 3333
          name: tcp-health-port
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 2
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: tcp-health-port
          timeoutSeconds: 1

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource echo-grpc/Deployment/echo-v1

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource echo-grpc/Deployment/echo-v1
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource echo-grpc/Deployment/echo-v1 failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource echo-grpc/Deployment/echo-v1 failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource echo-grpc/Deployment/echo-v1 failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource echo-grpc/Deployment/echo-v1 failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource echo-grpc/Deployment/echo-v1 failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource echo-grpc/Deployment/echo-v1 failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource echo-grpc/Deployment/echo-v1 failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: echo-v2
  namespace: echo-grpc
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: echo
      version: v2
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        inject.istio.io/templates: grpc-agent
        proxy.istio.io/config: '{"holdApplicationUntilProxyStarts": true}'
      labels:
        app: echo
        version: v2
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --metrics=15014
        - --xds-grpc-server=17070
        - --port
        - "18080"
        - --tcp
        - "19090"
        - --grpc
        - "17070"
        - --grpc
        - "17171"
        - --port
        - "3333"
        - --port
        - "8080"
        - --version
        - v2
        - --crt=/cert.crt
        - --key=/cert.key
        env:
        - name: INSTANCE_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: gcr.io/istio-testing/app:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: tcp-health-port
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 17070
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 17171
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 3333
          name: tcp-health-port
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 2
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: tcp-health-port
          timeoutSeconds: 1

kind: Deployment

  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: echo
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:

        - --port
        - "3333"
        - --port
        - "8080"

        - v1
        - --crt=/cert.crt
        - --key=/cert.key
        env:
        - name: INSTANCE_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: gcr.io/istio-testing/app:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1

        - "3333"

        - "8080"

        - --crt=/cert.crt
        - --key=/cert.key
        env:
        - name: INSTANCE_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: gcr.io/istio-testing/app:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10

          successThreshold: 1

          timeoutSeconds: 1

        ports:

          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 17171
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 3333
          name: tcp-health-port
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 2
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: tcp-health-port
          timeoutSeconds: 1

##### FILE: grpc-echo4_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to echo-grpc/Deployment/echo-v1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: echo-v1
  namespace: echo-grpc
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: echo
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        inject.istio.io/templates: grpc-agent
        proxy.istio.io/config: '{"holdApplicationUntilProxyStarts": true}'
      labels:
        app: echo
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --metrics=15014
        - --port
        - "18080"
        - --tcp
        - "19090"
        - --xds-grpc-server=17070
        - --grpc
        - "17070"
        - --grpc
        - "17171"
        - --port
        - "3333"
        - --port
        - "8080"
        - --version
        - v1
        - --crt=/cert.crt
        - --key=/cert.key
        env:
        - name: INSTANCE_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: gcr.io/istio-testing/app:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: tcp-health-port
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 17070
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 17171
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 3333
          name: tcp-health-port
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 2
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        securityContext:
          runAsGroup: 1338
          runAsUser: 1338
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: tcp-health-port
          timeoutSeconds: 1

---

##### FILE: grpc-gateway.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/grpc-gateway:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grpc-gateway
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grpc-gateway
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: grpc-gateway
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SERVICE_PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: bvquoc/gateway:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: grpc-gateway
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 64Mi

---

##### FILE: grpc-gateway_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/grpc-gateway-hpa:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: grpc-gateway-hpa
  namespace: default
spec:
  behavior:
    scaleDown:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 5
        type: Percent
        value: 100
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 10
    scaleUp:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 3
        type: Percent
        value: 100
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 0
  maxReplicas: 10
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 20
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 2
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: grpc-gateway

---

  name: grpc-ingress
  namespace: default

  rules:
  - http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: productcatalogservice
            port:
              number: 3550
        path: /hipstershop.ProductCatalogService
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: currencyservice
            port:
              number: 7000
        path: /hipstershop.CurrencyService

##### FILE: guacamole-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to guacamole/Deployment/guacamole:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: guacamole
  namespace: guacamole
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: guacamole
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: guacamole
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: guacamole/guacd:1.4.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
          tcpSocket:
            port: 4822
        name: guacd
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4822
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 4822
      - env:
        - name: GUACD_HOSTNAME
          value: localhost
        - name: GUACD_PORT
          value: "4822"
        - name: POSTGRES_PORT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: postgres-port
              name: guacamole-database-credentials
        - name: POSTGRES_HOSTNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: postgres-hostname
              name: guacamole-database-credentials
        - name: POSTGRES_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: postgres-database
              name: guacamole-database-credentials
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: postgres-user
              name: guacamole-database-credentials
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: postgres-password
              name: guacamole-database-credentials
        image: guacamole/guacamole:1.4.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8080
        name: guacamole
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: guacamole-app
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8080

---

##### FILE: guestbook.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/redis-master:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: redis
  name: redis-master
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis
      role: master
      tier: backend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: redis
        role: master
        tier: backend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: k8s.gcr.io/redis:e2e
        name: master
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi

---

##### FILE: guestbook-all-in-one_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/redis-replica:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: redis-replica
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis
      role: replica
      tier: backend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: redis
        role: replica
        tier: backend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GET_HOSTS_FROM
          value: dns
        image: gcr.io/google_samples/gb-redisslave:v1
        name: replica
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi

---

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/limits/

##### FILE: guestbook-all-in-one2_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/redis-leader:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: redis
    role: leader
    tier: backend
  name: redis-leader
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: redis
        role: leader
        tier: backend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/redis:6.0.5
        name: leader
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi

kind: Deployment

  name: redis-master
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1

      role: master
      tier: backend

        role: master
        tier: backend

##### FILE: guestbook-frontend.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: guestbook
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: guestbook
      tier: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: guestbook
        tier: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GET_HOSTS_FROM
          value: dns
        image: gcr.io/google-samples/gb-frontend:v4
        name: php-redis
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: guestbook
  name: frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: guestbook
      tier: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: guestbook
        tier: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GET_HOSTS_FROM
          value: dns
        image: gcr.io/google-samples/gb-frontend:v4
        name: php-redis
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/guestbook-ui-with-namespace-manifest:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: guestbook-ui-with-namespace-manifest
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/guestbook-ui-with-namespace-manifest:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: guestbook-ui-with-namespace-manifest
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

##### FILE: guestbook-ui-svc-ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/guestbook-ui:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    ingress.kubernetes.io/app-root: /
    ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-body-size: 100M
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
  name: guestbook-ui
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: example.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          serviceName: guestbook-ui-internal
          servicePort: 80
        path: /

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 1, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0
